# Collection of usueful functions to check and handle databases in R

***

*This package is developed to apply some testing for a specific case. Still some parts might apply elsewhere ...*

***

### Installing

Install via `devtools` or `Cloning` from [GitHub](https://github.com/mottensmann/DBChecks) 

```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github(repo = "mottensmann/DBChecks")
```


### Overview of the repository content

-   **`R`** Some functions

### Usage

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(DBChecks)
check.buzzard_db(input = "buzzard_db.RData")
```
